title: master yi bug
body: there is a bug for master yi where his double strike doesn't reduce q cdr

replies.body:
Sounds like this bug reported on reddit:

Type of Bug: Master Yi passive/alpha strike CD
Description: When Master Yi autoattacks with his passive, the second strike does not reduce the CD of alpha strike.
Video / Screenshot: -
Steps to reproduce: Autoattack as Yi and look at alphastrike cd
Expected result: Should be reduced twice
Observed result: Only reduced once
Reproduction rate: 10/10
System specs: -

Does that sound right? Our dev team is looking into it.
i was watching cowsep stream and i noticed it and he did too
